name: FAQs Made Easy
author: Amna

sections.description:
This plug-in is aimed at facilitating users to create Frequently Asked Questions section easily. With just one shortcode insertion, the page displays the FAQs in a fine way.

  1. Add New Question: Allows user to create a new question and save it ‘categorically’.
  2. FAQ Categories: Use the ‘FAQ Categories’ option to create different categories.
  3. Settings: Allows the user to select the display color from the amazing color palette.
sections.installation:
Go to \’Plugins\’ Option in your WordPress dashboard.
Click \’Add New\’.
In the \’SEARCH\’ box, type \’FAQs Made Easy\’
Install \’FAQs Made Easy\’ in your plug-ins.
Activate the plugin and enjoy!

Or Download the plug-in from wordpress:
1. Copy the files in the wp-content/plugins/ folder

or Upload the zipped file directly to your Plugins upload bar.

Go to \’Plugins\’ Option in your WordPress dashboard.
Click \’Add New\’.
In the \’SEARCH\’ box, type \’FAQs Made Easy\’
Install \’FAQs Made Easy\’ in your plug-ins.
Activate the plugin and enjoy!

Or Download the plug-in from wordpress:

or Upload the zipped file directly to your Plugins upload bar.
